blogPost.excerpt: Relocate.me is a 75,000-user strong niche job board for tech roles with relocation. It comes with a wealth of information on all things job relocation to help you decide where to move for work.
blogPost.body: Relocate.me is a 75,000-user strong niche job board for tech roles with relocation. It comes with a wealth of information on all things job relocation to help you decide where to move for work.
blogPost.title: Relocate 3.0 - Get your next tech job abroad
blogPost.author: Denis Dinkevich

localize.description: Relocate.me是一个拥有75,000名用户的强大的小众招聘网站，提供有搬迁功能的高科技职位。它提供了大量关于工作迁移的信息，帮助您决定在哪里工作。
localize.tagline: 在国外找到下一份技术工作

localize.description: Relocate.me是一個擁有75,000名用戶的強大的小衆招聘網站，提供有搬遷功能的高科技職位。它提供了大量關於工作遷移的信息，幫助您決定在哪裏工作。
localize.tagline: 在國外找到下一份技術工作

localize.description: Vmaker是一款集屏幕/網絡攝像頭錄像機、播放器和內置視頻編輯器於一體的視頻信息傳遞工具。📹 Vmaker提供了一流的視頻管理系統，爲資產管理提供了無縫體驗。📂
